department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: This bid solicitation cancels and supersedes previous bid solicitation with a new closing date.
description: Diesel generators, supply and delivery, training, and accessories
full_summary:
**Bid Solicitation Information**

* **Title**: Diesel Generator Sets Award - Declared Offer - B
* **Reference Number**: WS3787504297- Doc4320919367
* **Amendment Number**: 12th Amendment
* **Publication Date**: December 1, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: February 2, 2024, 2:00 p.m. EST
* **Amendment Date**: January 24, 2024

The previous bid solicitation WS3787504297 dated August 8, 2023, with a closing of September 27, 2023, has been cancelled by this revised bid solicitation.

**Notice of Opportunity**

The Government of Canada has a requirement to establish National Master Standing Offers (NMSO) for the supply and delivery of:

* Commercial and Militarized Diesel Generator Sets
* Accessories
* Training on engine controllers, transfer switches, networking systems, and generating units supplied as required

**Notice Type**: Request for Standing Offers (RSO)

**Procurement Method**: Open Bidding 

**Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

**Trade Agreements**: The contract is subject to the provisions of the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA) and various Free Trade Agreements (FTAs), including:

* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)

**Regions of Delivery**: 

* British Columbia
* Ontario (except National Capital Region)
* Quebec (except National Capital Region)
* Saskatchewan
* National Capital Region (NCR)
* Yukon
* Nova Scotia
* Newfoundland and Labrador
* New Brunswick
* Prince Edward Island
* Manitoba
* Northwest Territories

**Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)

**Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**Contact Information**:

To obtain more information or respond to this bid solicitation, please visit the following website: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/181
